mapper.insert: insert into feed_config (id, config_type, key_code, key_name, value_code, deleted, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, available) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{configType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{available,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update feed_config set config_type = #{configType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, key_code = #{keyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_name = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_code = #{valueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, config_type, key_code, key_name, value_code, deleted, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, available from feed_config where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, config_type, key_code, key_name, value_code, deleted, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, available from feed_config
